name: Neural recording of ventral striatum and pallidum in a probabilistic reward task
citation: Doya, Kenji (2023) Neural recording of ventral striatum and pallidum in a probabilistic reward task (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/000476/draft
keywords: reinforcement learning, value function, basal ganglia, striatum, pallidum
description:
This dataset includes behavioral and neural recording data for the paper: 
Ito M, Doya K (2009). Validation of decision-making models and analysis of decision variables in the rat basal ganglia. Journal of Neuroscience, 29, 9861-74. https://doi.org/10.1523/JNEUROSCI.6157-08.2009
studyTarget: To model rats' choice behavior by reinforcement learning models and to analyze the reward value coding in the ventral striatum and the ventral pallidum.
acknowledgement: This study was supported by the internal funding by Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology.
